namelist_definition.entry: Sets up tuning parameters for cice based on the atm mode Default: default
Sets up tuning parameters for cice based on the atm mode Default: default
Method of ice cover initialization. 'default'=>latitude and sst dependent, 'none'=>no ice, restart filename (must be a full path) Default: 'default'
restart pointer filename Default: 'rpointer.ice'
restart filename prefix
Restart file format. bin, nc, or pio Default: 'pio'
Restart with extended grid Default: false
history filename prefix
runid name
runtype. initial or continue
Days per year (Default: 365)
Initial year. (Default: 1)
time step, s (Default: 3600)
number of dynamic time steps per thermodynamic time step (Default: 1)
frequency of history output (once per 1,h,d,m,y) Default: 'mxxxx'
frequency of restart output (once per 1,h,d,m,y) Default: 'x'
frequency of history output (10 = once per 10 h,d,m,y) Default: 1
if true, write time-averages (not snapshots) Default: true
if true, write initial history file Default: false
diagnostic output frequency (10 = once per 10 dt) Default: 48
logical to print out diagnostics for global output Default: TRUE
logical to print out diagnostics for point data Default: FALSE
logical to control bit-for-bit computations Default: FALSE
list of longitudes for point diagnostics
list of latitudes for point diagnostics
64 bit offset Default: FALSE
file format ('bin'=binary or 'nc'=netcdf) Default: 'bin'
type of grid Default: 'rectangular'
input file for CICE grid info
input file for CICE grid info
category boundary formula (0 = old, 1 = new) Default: 0
input file for CICE coupling grid info if coupling grid is different than computation grid
method to use for distributing blocks Default: square-pop
method to use for distributing blocks Default: cartesian
method to use for distributing blocks Default: block
type of boundary in logical east-west dir Default: cyclic
Default: open
turn on masked halos in subcycling Default: true
turn on masked halos in tracer halo update in remap Default: true
turn on masked halos in state bound Default: true
Ice age tracer. Default: TRUE
Ice age restart from file. Default: TRUE

FY area restart from file.
lvl tracer.
lvl restart from file.

type of itd conversions (0 = delta, 1 = linear) Default: 1
type of thermodynamics (0=zero-layer, 1=bitz/lipscomb, 2=mushy) Default: 1
conductivity (MU71, bubbly) Default: bubbly
brine channel diameter (m) Default: 0.5e-03
critical Rayleigh number Default: 10
brine convection aspect ratio Default: 1
drainage strength parameter m/s/K Default: -1.5e-07
critical liquid fraction between 0 and 1 Default: 0.05
solid fraction at lower boundary between 0 and 1 Default: 0.85
type of dynamics (0=off, 1=evp, 2=eap) Default: 1
use revised EVP formulation Default: 'false'
subcycles per dynamics timestep Default: 120
incremental remapping transport scheme, remap or upwind Default: 'remap'
ice strength formulation (0=Hibler 79, 1=Rothrock 75) Default: 1
ridging participation function (0=Thorndike et al 75, 1=new participation ) Default: 1
ridging distribution function (0=old Hibler 80, 1=new redistribution) Default: 1
e-folding scale of ridged ice
Ratio of ridging work to PE change in ridging
shortwave method, 'default' ('ccsm3') or 'dEdd' Default:'dEdd'
albedo parameterization, 'default' ('ccsm3') or 'constant' Default:'default'
visible ice albedo for h gt ahmax
near-ir ice albedo for h gt ahmax
cold snow albedo, visible
cold snow albedo, near IR
albedo is constant above this thickness Default: 0.3
tuning parameter for delta-eddington shortwave for sea ice albedo
tuning parameter for delta-eddington shortwave for ponded sea ice albedo
tuning parameter for delta-eddington shortwave for broadband snow albedo
melt onset temperature tunable parameter for dEdd albedo
maximum melting snow grain radius tunable parameter for dEdd albedo
algae absorption coefficient for 0.5 m thick layer
critical ice lid thickness for topo ponds (m) Default: 0.01
snow depth of transition to bare sea ice (m) Default: 0.03
snow depth of transition to pond ice (m) Default: 0.03
time scale for flushing in permeable ice Default: 1.0e-03
pond refreezing formulation (hlid or cesm) Default: 'cesm'
minimum melt water added to ponds Default: 0.15
maximum melt water added to ponds Default: 1.0
aspect ratio of pond changes (depth:area) Default: 0.8
stability based boundary layer (default, constant)
first year of atm forcing data
atm input data format (bin, nc)
number of year of forcing data cycle
atm forcing data type (default, LYq, monthly, ncar, oned)
path to atmospheric forcing data directory
calculate wind stress and speed from files
calculate surface temperature

active ocean mixed layer calculation

restore ice state along lateral boundaries
